questions.question: Can I organize my videos by topic?
questions.answer: Yes! With Veenote, you can create spaces to organize your videos into collections, categories, and tags, making it easy to find exactly what you need.

questions.question: Is there a limit to the number of bookmarks I can add?
questions.answer: No, you can add as many bookmarks as you need in each video to capture every important moment.

questions.question: Can I use Veenote offline?
questions.answer: Currently, Veenote requires an internet connection to access videos and bookmarks, but we’re exploring offline capabilities for future updates.

questions.question: Is Veenote free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Veenote is completely free! We believe learning should be accessible to everyone, which is why we’re committed to keeping it free.

questions.question: Can I share my bookmarks with others?
questions.answer: Sharing features are in the works, so you’ll soon be able to share your bookmarks and collections with others!

questions.question: Why is Veenote free to use?
questions.answer: We believe learning is essential and should be accessible to everyone. That’s why Veenote is, and will continue to be, free for individuals.
